name: Moderately Warm
description:
Keep it Goin'!

Time moves when you do.

Try to get some hang time in this casual platformer!

Rings and Rhombuses will boost you up to space!

Crosses will push you back to the ground.

Click Rewind Arrow to try again, or Exit Arrow to Quit.

Hint: Try holding Space when landing right on top of a Rhombus, Gem, or Ring Platform to get a boost.

What's your high score?

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space Bar: Jump (Hold to Float, Release to Fall Quickly)

Shift: Sprint / Fast Forward

Left Control: Crouch / Mouse Control

----------

Made with love for Bolt Jam #9!

July 18th - July 25th, 2020

GIFs & Graphs:

https://gyazo.com/9eba6fde174ba2493b9f5bdcfa3e3fee
